document_data.name: Getsu
document_data.mainbody: '''Getsu''' was an unusually intelligent [[tigbanua buso]] in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Somehow, a tigbanua buso gained intelligence and named himself Getsu, plotting to destroy the city of Nakamaru.
document_data.History:
Getsu was a very ancient creature, a first a servant to humans but at one point he became foul and perverted. 

In 1357 DR, it decided to target the [[Worthless Flower]] [[yakuza]] gang to spread his infection. He would start by infecting the [[Wa-an dictionary#O|''oyabun'']] [[Uruma]].
document_data.Personality: Gestu liked to toy with and torture his victims. He was crueler than most of his fellows.
